cz.syntea.xdef.xml

Class KXmlOutStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.xml.KXmlOutStream

  • public class KXmlOutStream
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides incremental writer of XML to data stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KXmlOutStream(java.io.OutputStream out, java.lang.String encoding, boolean writeDocumentHeader)
      Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with java.io.OutputStream.

      Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with the name of output file.
      KXmlOutStream(java.io.Writer writer, java.lang.String encoding, boolean writeDocumentHeader)
      Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with java.io.Writer

    • Constructor Detail

      • KXmlOutStream

        public KXmlOutStream(java.io.Writer writer,
                     java.lang.String encoding,
                     boolean writeDocumentHeader)
        Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with java.io.Writer
        Parameters:
        writer - where to write XML.
        encoding - encoding of XML stream.
        writeDocumentHeader - if true then the XML header is written, otherwise no XML header is written.

      • KXmlOutStream

        public KXmlOutStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                     java.lang.String encoding,
                     boolean writeDocumentHeader)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with java.io.OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - where to write XML.
        encoding - encoding of XML stream.
        writeDocumentHeader - if true then the XML header is written, otherwise no XML header is written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.

      • KXmlOutStream

        public KXmlOutStream(java.lang.String filename,
                     java.lang.String encoding,
                     boolean writeDocumentHeader)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates new instance of DefXmlOutStream with the name of output file. If the file already exists it is deleted. The file will be created only if something was written.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of file where to write XML.
        encoding - encoding of XML stream.
        writeDocumentHeader - if true then the XML header is written, otherwise no XML header is written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.
